ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve never used forage nor complained about a low cap.  and i hate the effects on the legs and boots =)  level 25 is nifty to get something like this.  level
ygData.messageBody:
i've never used forage nor complained about a low cap. and i hate the
effects on the legs and boots =) level 25 is "nifty" to get something like
this. level 53 to get these is completely useless. a warrior getting
invisibility at level 53 however is something they would absolutely DIE for.
all 51+ bards already have to deal with a majority of useless songs above
50. now we have to deal with useless effects on the majority of our armor.
and still i play my bard and love my bard. and i've never bashed verant or
complained about class balance. but i won't make up excuses to justify
these effects being worth anything. it's like a bad joke. sorry i am at
work and cranky, no offense.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Everyone seems to be using Summon Food and Drink as the prime
> examples of
> uselessness. Well aren't we the class that has been
> complaining rather
> loudly for over a year that our forage was capped so darned low? Well
> aren't we?
>
> Warrior Greaves cast Invisibility. That's cool, but we have
> a song for that
> guys. Think about it, we *don't* have songs that can summon
> food and drink.
> I think it's kinda nifty, but I will admit that I hope the BP
> casts Gate.
> :)
>
> [51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
